answers.answer: Congrats on the good news!! I also have my GD test coming up
Yay - A good report! I'm all smiles!
Good deal! Its always nice to know things are going well!
Glad all is going well for you both.

question: Well I had an level 2 u/s yesterday and my son is healthy thus far.  And Im feeling blessed. This baby is not something I am taking for granted I am embracing every moment of this pregnancy....the good, the uncomfortable, etc.  We did confirm he is indeed a boy and AGAIN he was laying in a odd position that made the u/s tech have a tough time until the periontologist came in to help out.  And I couldnt get him to move....and normally he moves around all the time. My next appt in 4 wks I do my gestational diabetes testing.  And Im not worried but you never know. :-) My feelings right now are just THANKFUL and BLESSED.  And now I need to start my registry for showers coming up in the coming months.....
title: My 21 wk appt
